## ğŸ–¥ï¸ PROMPTS PARA LANDING PAGE UI (Stitch)

### OpciÃ³n 1: Hero Minimalista con Mapa

```
Design a modern, dark-themed landing page for "World Exams", an open-source global exam practice platform.

Hero section:
- Large animated world map showing dots for each country with exams
- Headline: "Practice for Your National Exam. Free Forever."
- Subheadline: "AI-powered question banks for 20+ countries"
- CTA button: "Find Your Exam" with gradient (gold to cyan)

Features section:
- 3 cards: "AI-Generated Questions", "Country-Specific Content", "100% Free"
- Each card with minimalist icon and brief text

Country grid:
- 20 country cards with flag colors as accent
- Each shows: Flag emoji, Exam name, "Practice Now" button

Footer:
- GitHub link, "Open Source" badge, AdSense notice

Style:
- Background: #121212 (dark)
- Text: #F5F5DC (beige)
- Font: Fira Code for headings, Inter for body
- Subtle noise texture overlay
- Glass morphism effects on cards
```

### OpciÃ³n 2: Carrusel de PaÃ­ses Interactivo

```
Create a sleek, cyberpunk-minimalist landing page for "World Exams" - a free global exam practice platform.

Layout:
- 3px horizontal stripe at top cycling through all country flag colors
- Large 3D globe visualization that users can spin

- Glitch effect on "WORLD EXAMS" title
- Typing animation: "Prepare for [Gaokao/SAT/ENEM/JEE...]"

- Horizontal scroll of country cards
- Each card: Flag stripe, country name, exam name, question count
- Hover reveals "Start Practicing" button

Color scheme:
- Dark background (#121212)
- Beige text (#F5F5DC)

```

### OpciÃ³n 3: Grid Dashboard Style

```
Design a dashboard-style landing page for "World Exams", an educational platform offering free exam practice globally.

Top navigation:
- Logo (globe with graduation cap)
- Search bar: "Search by country or exam..."

```

### OpciÃ³n 4: Storytelling Vertical Scroll

```
Create an immersive, scroll-driven landing page for "World Exams" - democratizing exam preparation worldwide.

Section 1 - Hero (100vh):
- Full-screen dark background with subtle star particles

- Step 2: Select subject

Section 6 - Join the Movement:
- GitHub contribution CTA
- "Add your country's exam"
- Social proof: contributor avatars

- Minimal, dark, with legal links

Style: Cinematic, dark mode, beige typography, smooth scroll animations
```

## ğŸ¯ PROMPTS PARA LOGO/ICONO (Gemini)

### OpciÃ³n 1: Globo AcadÃ©mico


### OpciÃ³n 4: Mapa de Puntos


## ğŸ”§ Notas de Uso

### Para Stitch (UI)

1. Copia el prompt completo
2. Ajusta dimensiones segÃºn necesidad (desktop/mobile)
3. Itera con feedback especÃ­fico
4. Exporta en formato web-ready

### Para Gemini (Logo/InfografÃ­a)

1. Usa el prompt como base
2. Especifica formato de salida (PNG, SVG, etc.)
3. Solicita variaciones si es necesario
4. Pide versiones para diferentes tamaÃ±os

### Recursos Adicionales

- **Colores exactos:** Ver `config/countries.config.ts`
- **TipografÃ­a:** Fira Code (mono), Inter (sans)
- **Iconos:** Lucide Icons, Heroicons
